plot: British retirees travel to India to take up residence in what they believe is a newly restored hotel. Less luxurious than advertised, the Marigold Hotel nevertheless slowly begins to charm in unexpected ways.

name: Resident Evil
plot: A special military unit fights a powerful, out-of-control supercomputer and hundreds of scientists who have mutated into flesh-eating creatures after a laboratory accident.

name: Resident Evil: Apocalypse
plot: Alice awakes in Raccoon City, only to find it has become infested with zombies and monsters. With the help of Jill Valentine and Carlos Olivera, Alice must find a way out of the city before it is destroyed by a nuclear missile.

name: Resident Evil: Extinction
plot: Survivors of the Raccoon City catastrophe travel across the Nevada desert, hoping to make it to Alaska. Alice joins the caravan and their fight against the evil Umbrella Corp.

name: Resident Evil: Afterlife
plot: While still out to destroy the evil Umbrella Corporation, Alice joins a group of survivors living in a prison surrounded by the infected who also want to relocate to the mysterious but supposedly unharmed safe haven known only as Arcadia.

name: Resident Evil: Retribution
plot: Alice fights alongside a resistance movement to regain her freedom from an Umbrella Corporation testing facility.

name: Dumb & Dumber
plot: The cross-country adventures of two good-hearted but incredibly stupid friends.

name: Blow
plot: The story of George Jung, the man who established the American cocaine market in the 1970s.

name: Die Hard with a Vengeance
plot: John McClane and a Harlem store owner are targeted by German terrorist Simon Gruber in New York City, where he plans to rob the Federal Reserve Building.

name: Die Hard 2
plot: John McClane attempts to avert disaster as rogue military operatives seize control of Dulles International Airport in Washington, D.C.

name: A Good Day to Die Hard
plot: John McClane travels to Russia to help out his seemingly wayward son, Jack, only to discover that Jack is a CIA operative working undercover, causing the father and son to team up against underworld forces.

name: L'Odyssee
plot: Biopic of the great French ocean-going adventurer and filmmaker.

name: The Founder
plot: The story of Ray Kroc, a salesman who turned two brothers' fast food eatery, McDonald's, into one of the biggest restaurant businesses in the world.

name: Dredd
plot: In a violent, futuristic city where the police have the authority to act as judge, jury and executioner, a cop teams with a trainee to take down a gang that deals the reality-altering drug, SLO-MO.

name: Star Wars: Clone Wars
plot: The events and battles of the Old Republic's last major war is recounted.

name: The Act of Killing
plot: A documentary which challenges former Indonesian death-squad leaders to reenact their mass-killings in whichever cinematic genres they wish, including classic Hollywood crime scenarios and lavish musical numbers.

name: No Strings Attached
plot: A guy and girl try to keep their relationship strictly physical, but it's not long before they learn that they want something more.

name: A Tale of Love and Darkness
plot: The story of Amos Oz's youth, set against the backdrop of the end of the British Mandate for Palestine and the early years of the State of Israel. The film details the young man's relationship with his mother and his beginnings as a writer, while looking at what happens when the stories we tell become the stories we live.

name: Jane Got a Gun
plot: A woman asks her ex-lover for help in order to save her outlaw husband from a gang out to kill him.

name: Brothers
plot: A young man comforts his older brother's wife and children after he goes missing in Afghanistan.

name: Julie & Julia
plot: Julia Child's story of her start in the cooking profession is intertwined with blogger Julie Powell's 2002 challenge to cook all the recipes in Child's first book.

name: The Deer Hunter
plot: An in-depth examination of the ways in which the U.S. Vietnam War impacts and disrupts the lives of people in a small industrial town in Pennsylvania.

name: Adaptation.
plot: A lovelorn screenwriter becomes desperate as he tries and fails to adapt 'The Orchid Thief' by Susan Orlean for the screen.

name: The Manchurian Candidate
plot: In the midst of the Gulf War, soldiers are kidnapped and brainwashed for sinister purposes.

name: Rendition
plot: A CIA analyst questions his assignment after witnessing an unorthodox interrogation at a secret detention facility outside the US.

name: Ex Machina
plot: A young programmer is selected to participate in a ground-breaking experiment in synthetic intelligence by evaluating the human qualities of a breath-taking humanoid A.I.

name: Seventh Son
plot: When Mother Malkin, the queen of evil witches, escapes the pit she was imprisoned in by professional monster hunter Spook decades ago and kills his apprentice, he recruits young Tom, the seventh son of the seventh son, to help him.

name: Intolerable Cruelty
plot: A beautiful gold digger matches wits with a shrewd Beverly Hills divorce lawyer who is increasingly attracted to her.

name: Big Fish
plot: A frustrated son tries to determine the fact from fiction in his dying father's life.

name: CJ7
plot: A poor Chinese laborer learns important lessons after his son gets a strange new toy.

name: The Look of Silence
plot: A family that survives the genocide in Indonesia confronts the men who killed one of their brothers.

name: The Guard
plot: An unorthodox Irish policeman with a confrontational personality is partnered with an up-tight F.B.I. agent to investigate an international drug-smuggling ring.

name: Pixels
plot: When aliens misinterpret video feeds of classic arcade games as a declaration of war, they attack the Earth in the form of the video games.

name: Frank
plot: Jon, a young wanna-be musician, discovers he's bitten off more than he can chew when he joins an eccentric pop band led by the mysterious and enigmatic Frank.

name: Robot & Frank
plot: Set in the near future, an ex-jewel thief receives a gift from his son: a robot butler programmed to look after him. But soon the two companions try their luck as a heist team.

name: Blades of Glory
plot: In 2002, two rival Olympic ice skaters were stripped of their gold medals and permanently banned from men's single competition. Presently, however, they've found a loophole that will allow them to qualify as a pairs team.

name: Miss Sloane
plot: In the high-stakes world of political power-brokers, Elizabeth Sloane is the most sought after and formidable lobbyist in D.C. But when taking on the most powerful opponent of her career, she finds winning may come at too high a price.

name: Lion
plot: A five-year-old Indian boy gets lost on the streets of Calcutta, thousands of kilometers from home. He survives many challenges before being adopted by a couple in Australia; 25 years later, he sets out to find his lost family.

name: The Great Wall
plot: European mercenaries searching for black powder become embroiled in the defense of the Great Wall of China against a horde of monstrous creatures.

name: The Taking of Pelham 1 2 3
plot: Armed men hijack a New York City subway train, holding the passengers hostage in return for a ransom, and turning an ordinary day's work for dispatcher Walter Garber into a face-off with the mastermind behind the crime.

name: The Vow
plot: A car accident puts Paige in a coma, and when she wakes up with severe memory loss, her husband Leo works to win her heart again.

name: Godzilla
plot: The world is beset by the appearance of monstrous creatures, but one of them may be the only one who can save humanity.

name: Memoirs of a Geisha
plot: Nitta Sayuri reveals how she transcended her fishing-village roots and became one of Japan's most celebrated geisha.

name: San Andreas
plot: In the aftermath of a massive earthquake in California, a rescue-chopper pilot makes a dangerous journey with his ex-wife across the state in order to rescue his daughter.

name: The Talented Mr. Ripley
plot: In late 1950s New York, Tom Ripley, a young underachiever, is sent to Italy to retrieve Dickie Greenleaf, a rich and spoiled millionaire playboy. But when the errand fails, Ripley takes extreme measures.

name: Titan A.E.
plot: A young man learns that he has to find a hidden Earth ship before an enemy alien species does in order to secure the survival of humanity.
director: Don Bluth, Gary Goldman, Art Vitello

name: Sometimes in April
plot: Debra Winger, Oris Erhuero and Idris Elba star in this drama framed by the Rwandan genocide.

name: First They Killed My Father: A Daughter of Cambodia Remembers
plot: Cambodian author and human rights activist Loung Ung recounts the horrors she suffered under the rule of the deadly Khmer Rouge.

name: The Walking Dead: The Game - Season 1
Speed
plot: A young police officer must prevent a bomb exploding aboard a city bus by keeping its speed above 50 mph.

name: Northanger Abbey
plot: A young woman's penchant for sensational Gothic novels leads to misunderstandings in the matters of the heart.

name: Persuasion
plot: Royal Navy captain Wentworth was haughtily turned down eight years ago as suitor of pompous baronet Sir Walter Elliot's daughter Anne, despite true love. Now he visits their former seaside ...

name: Avatar: The Last Airbender
plot: In a war-torn world of elemental magic, a young boy reawakens to undertake a dangerous mystic quest to fulfill his destiny as the Avatar, and bring peace to the world.

episodes.title: The Spirit World: Winter Solstice, Part 1
The Siege of the North: Part 1
The Siege of the North: Part 2
The Tales of Ba Sing Se
The Day of Black Sun: Part 1 - The Invasion
The Day of Black Sun: Part 2 - The Eclipse
Sozin's Comet: Part 1 - The Phoenix King
Sozin's Comet: Part 2 - The Old Masters
Sozin's Comet: Part 3 - Into the Inferno

name: The Last Airbender
plot: Follows the adventures of Aang, a young successor to a long line of Avatars, who must master all four elements and stop the Fire Nation from enslaving the Water Tribes and the Earth Kingdom.

name: Miami Vice
plot: Based on the 1980s TV action/drama, this update focuses on vice detectives Crockett and Tubbs as their respective personal and professional lives become dangerously intertwined.

name: All the President's Men
plot: "The Washington Post" reporters Bob Woodward and Carl Bernstein uncover the details of the Watergate scandal that leads to President Richard Nixon's resignation.

name: How to Train Your Dragon 2
plot: When Hiccup and Toothless discover an ice cave that is home to hundreds of new wild dragons and the mysterious Dragon Rider, the two friends find themselves at the center of a battle to protect the peace.

name: Jobs
plot: The story of Steve Jobs' ascension from college dropout into one of the most revered creative entrepreneurs of the 20th century.

name: Blue Jasmine
plot: A New York socialite, deeply troubled and in denial, arrives in San Francisco to impose upon her sister. She looks a million, but isn't bringing money, peace, or love...

name: Snowpiercer
plot: Set in a future where a failed climate-change experiment kills all life on the planet except for a lucky few who boarded the Snowpiercer, a train that travels around the globe, where a class system emerges.

name: Kick-Ass 2
plot: Following Kick-Ass' heroics, other citizens are inspired to become masked crusaders. But the Red Mist leads his own group of evil supervillains to kill Kick-Ass and destroy everything for which he stands.

name: Ted
plot: John Bennett, a man whose childhood wish of bringing his teddy bear to life came true, now must decide between keeping the relationship with the bear or his girlfriend, Lori.

name: Wreck-It Ralph
plot: A video game villain wants to be a hero and sets out to fulfill his dream, but his quest brings havoc to the whole arcade where he lives.

name: Inside Llewyn Davis
plot: A week in the life of a young singer as he navigates the Greenwich Village folk scene of 1961.

name: I Am Number Four
plot: Aliens and their Guardians are hiding on Earth from intergalactic bounty hunters. They can only be killed in numerical order, and Number Four is next on the list. This is his story.

name: TRON: Legacy
plot: The son of a virtual world designer goes looking for his father and ends up inside the digital world that his father designed. He meets his father's corrupted creation and a unique ally who was born inside the digital world.

name: The Social Network
plot: Harvard student Mark Zuckerberg creates the social networking site that would become known as Facebook, but is later sued by two brothers who claimed he stole their idea, and the co-founder who was later squeezed out of the business.

name: The Road
plot: In a dangerous post-apocalyptic world, an ailing father defends his son as they slowly travel to the sea.

name: The Book of Eli
plot: A post-apocalyptic tale, in which a lone man fights his way across America in order to protect a sacred book that holds the secrets to saving humankind.

name: Percy Jackson & the Olympians: The Lightning Thief
plot: A teenager discovers he's the descendant of a Greek god and sets out on an adventure to settle an on-going battle between the gods.

name: Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time
plot: A young fugitive prince and princess must stop a villain who unknowingly threatens to destroy the world with a special dagger that enables the magic sand inside to reverse time.

name: Surrogates
plot: Set in a futuristic world where humans live in isolation and interact through surrogate robots, a cop is forced to leave his home for the first time in years in order to investigate the murders of others' surrogates.
A frustrated writer struggles to keep his family alive when a series of global catastrophes threatens to annihilate mankind.

name: Defiance
plot: Jewish brothers in Nazi-occupied Eastern Europe escape into the Belarussian forests, where they join Russian resistance fighters and endeavor to build a village in order to protect themselves and about 1,000 Jewish non-combatants.

name: Taken
plot: A retired CIA agent travels across Europe and relies on his old skills to save his estranged daughter, who has been kidnapped while on a trip to Paris.

name: Into the Wild
plot: After graduating from Emory University, top student and athlete Christopher McCandless abandons his possessions, gives his entire $24,000 savings account to charity and hitchhikes to Alaska to live in the wilderness. Along the way, Christopher encounters a series of characters that shape his life.

name: Napoleon Dynamite
plot: A listless and alienated teenager decides to help his new friend win the class presidency in their small western high school, while he must deal with his bizarre family life back home.

name: Blood Diamond
plot: A fisherman, a smuggler, and a syndicate of businessmen match wits over the possession of a priceless diamond.

name: Lord of War
plot: An arms dealer confronts the morality of his work as he is being chased by an Interpol agent.

name: The Day After Tomorrow
plot: Jack Hall, paleoclimatologist, must make a daring trek across America to reach his son, trapped in the cross-hairs of a sudden international storm which plunges the planet into a new Ice Age.

name: The Hours
plot: The story of how the novel "Mrs. Dalloway" affects three generations of women, all of whom, in one way or another, have had to deal with suicide in their lives.

name: Wonder Woman
plot: An Amazon princess leaves her island home to explore the world and, in doing so, becomes one of the world's greatest heroes.

name: Justice League
plot: Fueled by his restored faith in humanity and inspired by Superman's selfless act, Bruce Wayne enlists the help of his newfound ally, Diana Prince, to face an even greater enemy.

name: Doctor Strange
plot: A former neurosurgeon embarks on a journey of healing only to be drawn into the world of the mystic arts.

name: Captain Fantastic
plot: In the forests of the Pacific Northwest, a father devoted to raising his six kids with a rigorous physical and intellectual education is forced to leave his paradise and enter the world, challenging his idea of what it means to be a parent.

name: Alice Through the Looking Glass
plot: Alice returns to the whimsical world of Wonderland and travels back in time to help the Mad Hatter.

name: Trumbo
plot: In 1947, Dalton Trumbo was Hollywood's top screenwriter, until he and other artists were jailed and blacklisted for their political beliefs.

name: Open Your Eyes
plot: A very handsome man finds the love of his life, but he suffers an accident and needs to have his face rebuilt by surgery after it is severely disfigured.

name: Nightcrawler
plot: When Louis Bloom, a driven man desperate for work, muscles into the world of L.A. crime journalism, he blurs the line between observer and participant to become the star of his own story. Aiding him in his effort is Nina, a TV-news veteran.

name: Youth
plot: A retired orchestra conductor is on holiday with his daughter and his film director best friend in the Alps when he receives an invitation from Queen Elizabeth II to perform for Prince Philip's birthday.

name: Borgman
plot: A vagrant enters the lives of an arrogant upper-class family, turning their lives into a psychological nightmare in the process.

name: Dallas Buyers Club
plot: In 1985 Dallas, electrician and hustler Ron Woodroof works around the system to help AIDS patients get the medication they need after he is diagnosed with the disease.

name: Festen
plot: At Helge's 60th birthday party, some unpleasant family truths are revealed.

name: Chicken Run
plot: When a cockerel apparently flies into a chicken farm, the chickens see him as an opportunity to escape their evil owners.

name: Hellboy
plot: A demon, raised from infancy after being conjured by and rescued from the Nazis, grows up to become a defender against the forces of darkness.

name: The Tree of Life
plot: The story of a family in Waco, Texas in 1956. The eldest son witnesses the loss of innocence and struggles with his parents' conflicting teachings.

name: Moonlight
plot: A timeless story of human self-discovery and connection, Moonlight chronicles the life of a young black man from childhood to adulthood as he struggles to find his place in the world while growing up in a rough neighborhood of Miami.

name: The New World
plot: The story of the English exploration of Virginia, and of the changing world and loves of Pocahontas.

name: The Thin Red Line
plot: Terrence Malick's adaptation of James Jones' autobiographical 1962 novel, focusing on the conflict at Guadalcanal during the second World War.

name: Melancholia
plot: Two sisters find their already strained relationship challenged as a mysterious new planet threatens to collide with Earth.

name: The Master
plot: A Naval veteran arrives home from war unsettled and uncertain of his future - until he is tantalized by The Cause and its charismatic leader.

name: The Lego Batman Movie
plot: Bruce Wayne must not only deal with the criminals of Gotham City, but also the responsibility of raising a boy he adopted.

name: Next of Kin
plot: Truman, a Chicago cop, sets out to find the killer of his brother. Meanwhile, another of his brothers, Briar (a hillbilly) decides to find the killer himself.

name: The Handmaiden
plot: A woman is hired as a handmaiden to a Japanese heiress, but secretly she is involved in a plot to defraud her.

name: American History X
plot: A former neo-nazi skinhead tries to prevent his younger brother from going down the same wrong path that he did.

name: Ronin
plot: A freelancing former U.S. intelligence agent tries to track down a mysterious package that is wanted by both the Irish and the Russians.

name: King Arthur
plot: A demystified take on the tale of King Arthur and the Knights of the Round Table.

name: The A-Team
plot: A group of Iraq War veterans looks to clear their name with the U.S. military, who suspect the four men of committing a crime for which they were framed.

name: The A-Team
plot: Four Vietnam vets, framed for a crime they didn't commit, help the innocent while on the run from the military.

episodes.title: The Rabbit Who Ate Las Vegas
The Beast from the Belly of a Boeing
When You Comin' Back, Range Rider?: Part 1

name: Thelma & Louise
plot: Two best friends set out on an adventure but it soon turns around to a terrifying escape from being hunted by the American police as these two girls escape for the crimes they committed.

plot: Ten years before Kirk, Spock and the Enterprise, the USS Discovery discovers new worlds and lifeforms as one Starfleet officer learns to understand all things alien.

episodes.title: The Butcher's Knife Cares Not for the Lamb's Cry
Magic to Make the Sanest Man Go Mad

name: Moonstruck

name: The Orville

name: Game of Thrones: A Telltale Games Series

plot: A behind-the-scenes look at how Jim Carrey adopted the persona of idiosyncratic comedian Andy Kaufman on the set of Man on the Moon (1999).

name: Planet of the Apes
plot: An Air Force astronaut crash lands on a mysterious planet where evolved, talking apes dominate a race of primitive humans.

plot: Based on the book by Toni Morrison, in which a slave is visited by the spirit of her deceased daughter.

plot: A secret agent is sent to Sydney, to find and destroy a genetically modified disease called "Chimera".

plot: Agent Ethan Hunt comes into conflict with a dangerous and sadistic arms dealer who threatens his life and his fianceé in response .

name: Altered Carbon

name: Stalker

plot: Samson and Delilah's world is small- an isolated community in the Central Australian desert. When tragedy strikes they turn their backs on home and embark on a journey of survival. Lost, ...

name: Rushmore
plot: The extracurricular king of Rushmore preparatory school is put on academic probation.

episodes.title: Civil War Part 1: The Fall of Attilan
Civil War Part 2: The Mighty Avengers
Civil War Part 3: The Drums of War

name: Black Panther
